channel.title: Appliance Parts on ARS Repair Inc.
channel.description: Recent content in Appliance Parts on ARS Repair Inc.

item.title: How To Replace Dryer Thermal Fuse (Part # 3392519)
item.description: Step-by-step guide to replace a dryer thermal fuse (part #3392519). Learn how to diagnose and fix a non-heating dryer for Whirlpool, Kenmore, Maytag, and KitchenAid models.

item.title: How to Replace Washing Machine Drive Belt (Part#WPW10006384)
item.description: If your washing machine won’t spin, agitate, drain, or is making a loud noise, you may need to replace the washing machine drive belt (Part #WPW10006384).

item.title: Can an Oven Thermostat Be Repaired? | ARS
item.description: Oven Thermostat Repair. We fixes fridges, stoves, washer, dryers, dishwashers, small appliances and more. Call for affordable appliance repair.

item.title: How to Replace Dryer Thermal Fuse (Part#279816) - ARS Repair
item.description: If you are having any problem with your dryer not drying clothes, you may need to replace the Dryer Thermal Fuse (Part# 279816, W279816, WP 279816).

item.title: How to Replace Refrigerator Defrost Timer (Part# WR9X489)
item.description: If your refrigerator is too warm, freezer won’t defrost or too cold then you may need to replace the defrost timer (part# WR9X489).

item.title: How to Replace Refrigerator Drain Pipe (Part# W10619951) ARS
item.description: If the bottom of your fridge is leaking water, freezer has frost build-up or is not defrosting you may need to replace or clear the refrigerator drain pipe…

item.title: How To Replace Washer Lid Switch (Part #3949238), Repair tip
item.description: If your washing machine fills with water and agitates, but does not spin or drain, you may need to replace the washer lid switch part number 3949238.

item.title: Replacing GE Refrigerator Main Control Board Part#WR55X10942
item.description: If your refrigerator is not running or not cooling, you may need to replace the Main Control Board (GE Part # WR55X10942). You will need a quarter inch nut…

item.title: Appliance Repair Parts - ARS is at diagnosing your units!
item.description: Appliance Repair Parts. ARS is the top choice for appliance diagnosis. We fix fridges, stoves, ovens, dishwasher, washer and dryers. Call us today!
